entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -13.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chesterfield Inlet Airport 3:30 PM CDT Monday 27 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -13.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -15.8°C
Wind: NNE 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow at times. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 15 with temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow at times in the morning. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 15 with temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Monday 27 March 2023
